code: import{styles}from'./globals';import'../styles/targetStyles.css';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{Row,Col,Typography,Button}from'antd';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var Hero=function Hero(){var Title=Typography.Title;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Row,{className:"hero",style:{height:'640px',backgroundColor:'#277DCD',width:'calc(100vw - 17px)',alignContent:'center',justifyContent:'center',marginTop:'calc(64px + 1in)'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Col,{span:24,style:{display:'flex',flexDirection:'column',alignItems:'center'},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Title,{className:"hero-message",style:styles.heroMessage.support,children:["Take everything further.",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{})," ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{style:styles.heroMessage.main,children:"SPECC"})," yourself ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{style:styles.heroMessage.main,children:"UP"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Col,{style:{marginTop:'32px'},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/register",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{className:"create-account",style:{border:'2px solid #FFBF00',backgroundColor:'#277DCD',color:'#FFBF00',font:'bold 18px Roboto, sans-serif',padding:'12px 32px',height:'50px',borderRadius:' 5px'},children:"Create Account"})})})]});};export default Hero;
